daye daru­wange daksha­tha­wa­lata gala­pena wisha­ya­ma­la­wak mangin wada loka­yata uchitha puhunu shrama bala­ka­yak bihi kiri­math, manawa pragdha­naya bala­ga­nwi­math para­martha kara­ga­ni­min handunwa dena wruththiya wishaya dharawa mangin pahatha dakwena ara­munu itu kara­ga­ni­mata bala­po­roththu we: * yawa­jiwa ige­nu­mata ha goliya pura­wa­si­bha­waye waga­kim dari­mata sisun manawa suda­nam kirima * wruththiya ladiya wada loka­yata gala­pa­ga­ni­min wruththiya kshethra­wa­lata suda­nam kirime widhi­krama prawa­rdha­naya * pala­dayi ha nirmana padaka danum aarthi­ka­ya­kata sakriya lesa dayaka wanu pinisa deshiya wyangitha danuma tharuna shakyatha shakthi­math kirime uthpre­ra­ka­yak lesa bhawitha kirima * pari­sa­rika washa­yen prabala thira­sara sanwa­rdhana prawa­rdha­na­yata upa­kari wima * duppa­thkama pitu­da­kima susadhya kirima * shasthriya danuma ha prayojya yathartha athara athi para­tha­raya adu kara­min, jiwi­thaya sandaha adhya­pa­naya sambandha ige­nu­mla­bhi­yage danu­wath bawa wardha­naya wruththiya wishaya dharawa pahatha dakwena paridi pradhana sanra­chaka thuna­kin sama­nwi­thaya: 1.
